name: Street Rat III (Dragon Princes: Fiumenze)
description:
Episode three of a continuing story about a street rat in the city of Fiumenze. With the loot, a blue dragon egg, and the secret of his transformation into  a real rat, Ratto heads home to his gang hideout. It's time for a party! But the end of the night finds him more alone than ever.

Set in the D&D campaign world Tirenia http://tirenia.blogspot.com/

Episode One is here: https://skybeargames.itch.io/dpf-street-rat

Episode Two is here: https://skybeargames.itch.io/dpf-street-rat-ii

Thank you to Adam Le Doux for making Bitsy,  ayolland for Borksy and Sean S LeBlanc for the hacks, and all the lovely people who write tutorials and other hacks on here and Discord.
